name: NOTHING MATTERS
description:
Nothing matters is a nihilistic game about nothing and everything, made by TheArttu68.

In the game you have a minute to seek shelter from a nuclear explosion, and if you are unable to find it, then you are going to get an end game screen with a nihilistic message. There isn't really any way to win, but there are different endings you can get by dying in different places.

Thank you for checking the game out! But it doesn't matter, because in the end nothing matters.

Arrow keys to move.
